title: Large scale shell model calculation for collectivity in nuclei beyond 78Ni
speaker: 黄凌宇
paperTitle: Large scale shell model calculation for collectivity in nuclei beyond 78Ni
paperAbstract: A shell model effective interaction for nuclei beyond the double magic nucleus 78Ni is constructed. First, the single-particle evolutions for valence neutrons above the double magic 78Ni are systematically explored in the
